description: Consume messages from a Kafka topic

properties.name: topic
properties.description: Name of the queue of topic to consume from

properties.name: useSchemaRegistry
properties.description: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to allow sending message to a previously non exisiting topic

options.name: allowAutoTopicCreation
options.description: Whether to allow sending message to a previously non exisiting topic

options.name: autoCommitThreshold
options.description: The consumer will commit offsets after resolving a given number of messages

options.name: autoCommitInterval
options.description: The consumer will commit offsets after a given period, for example, five seconds

options.name: heartbeatInterval
options.description: Heartbeats are used to ensure that the consumer's session stays active

options.name: maxInFlightRequests
options.description: The maximum number of unacknowledged requests the client will send on a single connection

options.name: fromBeginning
options.description: Whether to read message from beginning

options.name: jsonParseMessage
options.description: Whether to try to parse the message to an object
